Does anyone have the agent keys for this so they can be managed from the main console?

yeah all these work great, but if you need to set this up in a network enviorment with more than one system to backup you need to use the remote management console and this option does not seem to be cracked. In version 9.x it was separate from the license manager part of acronis so this feature worked on the cracked version of 9.x.

If anyone knows how to get around this please do tell!
